options.name: room
options.description: The room/WFO you want to subscribe to

options.name: message
options.description: Custom message to send when alert is sent

options.name: filter
options.description: Filter for the alert, you can comma separate multiple strings of text. Don't use spaces between the commas

options.name: filterevt
options.description: Filter for event type, you can comma separate multiple strings of text. Don't use spaces between the commas

options.name: room
options.description: The room/WFO you want to unsubscribe from

name: list
description: List all subscribed rooms for this channel

name: setupall
description: [OWNER ONLY] Setup channels in a category for all rooms

name: outlook
description: Get day 1-8 storm or fire outlook from the SPC

options.name: population_overlay
options.description: Whether to add the population overlay

options.name: city_overlay
options.description: Whether to add the city name overlay

options.name: cwa_overlay
options.description: Whether to add the County Warning Area overlay

options.name: rfc_overlay
options.description: Whether to add the River Forecast Center overlay

options.name: interstate_overlay
options.description: Whether to add the interstate overlay

options.name: county_overlay
options.description: Whether to add the county lines overlay

options.name: tribal_overlay
options.description: Whether to add the tribal lands overlay

options.name: artcc_overlay
options.description: Whether to add the Air Route Traffic Control Centers overlay

options.name: fema_overlay
options.description: Whether to add the FEMA regions overlay

name: alertmap
description: Get a map of active alerts
